title: WIPER BLADE
abstract: A washer apparatus 50 is provided to a coupling portion CN between a blade rubber 20 and a holder member 30, and has a length in a longitudinal direction of the blade rubber 20, which is set to be shorter than that of the blade rubber 20 in the longitudinal direction, and inner-peripheral-side-oriented injection nozzles 53a and 55a and an outer-peripheral-side-oriented injection nozzle 54a have openings oriented to respective ends of the blade rubber 20 in the longitudinal direction.

methods: Utilize a washer apparatus with inner-peripheral-side-oriented and outer-peripheral-side-oriented injection nozzles.

motivations: There is a need for an improved washer apparatus for wiper blades.
objectives: To provide a washer apparatus to a coupling portion between a blade rubber and a holder member.
methods: The washer apparatus has a length in the longitudinal direction of the blade rubber, which is set to be shorter than that of the blade rubber.
The apparatus includes inner-peripheral-side-oriented injection nozzles and an outer-peripheral-side-oriented injection nozzle with openings oriented to respective ends of the blade rubber.
results: The proposed washer apparatus design could potentially improve the performance of wiper blades.
openai_json.research_subject: Design and implementation of a washer apparatus for wiper blades

motivations: Traditional wiper blade designs may have limitations in effectively distributing washer fluid across the entire blade length.
There is a need for improved washer fluid injection systems that can better clean windshield surfaces.
objectives: Design a washer apparatus integrated with the wiper blade coupling portion that optimizes fluid distribution.
Develop injection nozzles oriented toward blade ends to enhance cleaning coverage.
methods: Position the washer apparatus at the coupling portion between the blade rubber and holder member.
Configure injection nozzles with specific orientations toward the blade rubber ends.
results: Improved distribution of washer fluid across the windshield surface.
Enhanced cleaning performance through optimized nozzle positioning and orientation.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Wiper blade washer apparatus design with oriented injection nozzles
